76  QString modality;

101 QtDcmManager * QtDcmManager::instance()
102 {
103  if ( _instance == 0 )
104  _instance = new QtDcmManager();
105  return _instance;
106 }

108 QtDcmManager::QtDcmManager() : d ( new QtDcmManagerPrivate )
109 {
110  //Initialization of the private attributes
111  d->useConverter = true;
112  d->mode = "PACS";
113  d->dicomdir = "";
114  d->outputDir = "";
115 
116  d->outputdirMode = DIALOG;
117 
118  d->patientName = "*";
119  d->patientId = "*";
120  d->patientBirthDate = "";
121  d->modality = "*";
122  d->date1 = "*";
123  d->date2 = "*";
124  d->serieDescription = "*";
125  d->studyDescription = "*";
126  d->patientSex = "*";
127 
128  d->mainWidget = NULL;
129  d->patientsTreeWidget = NULL;
130  d->studiesTreeWidget = NULL;
131  d->seriesTreeWidget = NULL;
132 
133  d->importWidget = NULL;
134  d->previewWidget = NULL;
135  d->serieInfoWidget = NULL;
136  d->currentPacs = NULL;
137  //Creation of the temporary directories (/tmp/qtdcm and /tmp/qtdcm/logs)
138  this->createTemporaryDirs();
139 }

141 QtDcmManager::~QtDcmManager()
142 {
143  this->deleteTemporaryDirs();
144 }

147 {

150  {

152  d->mainWidget->updatePacsComboBox();
153  }

226 void QtDcmManager::displayErrorMessage ( QString message )
227 {
228  //Instanciate a message from the parent i.e qtdcm
229  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( d->mainWidget );
230  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Critical );
231  msgBox->setText ( message );
232  msgBox->exec();
233  delete msgBox;
234 }

246 void QtDcmManager::findPatientsScu()
247 {
248  if ( d->mainWidget->pacsComboBox->count() )
249  {
250  d->seriesToImport.clear();
251  d->mode = "PACS";
252 
253  QtDcmFindScu * finder = new QtDcmFindScu ( this );
254  finder->findPatientsScu ( d->patientName, d->patientSex );
255  delete finder;
256  }
257 }
258 
259 void QtDcmManager::findStudiesScu ( QString patientName )
260 {
261  d->seriesToImport.clear();
262 
263  QtDcmFindScu * finder = new QtDcmFindScu ( this );
264  finder->findStudiesScu ( patientName, d->studyDescription, d->date1, d->date2 );
265  delete finder;
266 }

269 {

272  QtDcmFindScu * finder = new QtDcmFindScu ( this );
273  finder->findSeriesScu ( patientName, studyUid, d->studyDescription, d->serieDescription, d->modality );
274  delete finder;
275 }

284 void QtDcmManager::foundPatient ( QMap<QString, QString> infosMap )
285 {
286  if ( d->patientsTreeWidget )
287  {
288  QTreeWidgetItem * patientItem = new QTreeWidgetItem ( d->patientsTreeWidget->invisibleRootItem() );
289  patientItem->setText ( 0, infosMap["Name"] );
290  patientItem->setText ( 1, infosMap["ID"] );
291  patientItem->setText ( 2, QDate::fromString ( infosMap["Birthdate"], "yyyyMMdd" ).toString ( "dd/MM/yyyy" ) );
292  patientItem->setText ( 3, infosMap["Sex"] );
293  }
294 }
295 
296 void QtDcmManager::foundStudy ( QMap<QString, QString> infosMap )
297 {
298  if ( d->studiesTreeWidget )
299  {
300  QTreeWidgetItem * studyItem = new QTreeWidgetItem ( d->studiesTreeWidget->invisibleRootItem() );
301  studyItem->setText ( 0, infosMap["Description"] );
302  studyItem->setText ( 1, QDate::fromString ( infosMap["Date"], "yyyyMMdd" ).toString ( "dd/MM/yyyy" ) );
303  studyItem->setData ( 2, 0, infosMap["UID"] );
304  studyItem->setText ( 2, infosMap["UID"] );
305  studyItem->setData ( 3, 0, infosMap["ID"] );
306  }
307 }
308 
309 void QtDcmManager::foundSerie ( QMap<QString, QString> infosMap )
310 {
311  if ( d->seriesTreeWidget )
312  {
313  QTreeWidgetItem * serieItem = new QTreeWidgetItem ( d->seriesTreeWidget->invisibleRootItem() );
314  serieItem->setText ( 0, infosMap["Description"] );
315  serieItem->setText ( 1, infosMap["Modality"] );
316  serieItem->setText ( 2, QDate::fromString ( infosMap["Date"], "yyyyMMdd" ).toString ( "dd/MM/yyyy" ) );
317  serieItem->setText ( 3, infosMap["ID"] );
318  serieItem->setData ( 4, 0, QVariant ( infosMap["InstanceCount"] ) );
319  serieItem->setData ( 5, 0, QVariant ( infosMap["Institution"] ) );
320  serieItem->setData ( 6, 0, QVariant ( infosMap["Operator"] ) );
321  serieItem->setCheckState ( 0, Qt::Unchecked );
322  }
323 }
324 
325 void QtDcmManager::foundImage ( QString image, int number )
326 {
327  d->listImages.append ( image );
328  if ( number )
329  d->mapImages.insert ( number, image );
330 }
331 
332 void QtDcmManager::loadDicomdir()
333 {
334  if ( d->dicomdir.isEmpty() )
335  return;
336 
337  d->mode = "CD";
338 
339  //Load dicomdir in a DCMTK DicomFileFormat object
340  OFCondition status;
341  if ( ! ( status = d->dfile.loadFile ( d->dicomdir.toUtf8().data() ) ).good() )
342  return;
343 
344  this->findPatientsDicomdir();
345 }
346 
347 void QtDcmManager::findPatientsDicomdir()
348 {
349  d->seriesToImport.clear();
350  QtDcmFindDicomdir * finder = new QtDcmFindDicomdir ( this );
351  finder->setDcmItem ( d->dfile.getDataset() );
352  finder->findPatients();
353  delete finder;
354 }
355

358  d->seriesToImport.clear();
359  QtDcmFindDicomdir * finder = new QtDcmFindDicomdir ( this );
360  finder->setDcmItem ( d->dfile.getDataset() );
361  finder->findStudies ( patientName );
362  delete finder;
363 }

365 void QtDcmManager::findSeriesDicomdir ( QString patientName, QString studyUID )
366 {
367  d->seriesToImport.clear();
368  QtDcmFindDicomdir * finder = new QtDcmFindDicomdir ( this );

371  delete finder;

374 void QtDcmManager::findImagesDicomdir ( QString uid )
375 {
376  QtDcmFindDicomdir * finder = new QtDcmFindDicomdir ( this );

381 
382 void QtDcmManager::moveSelectedSeries()
383 {
384  if ( !d->tempDir.exists() )
385  return;
386 
387  qApp->processEvents();
388 
389  if ( d->mode == "CD" )
390  {
391  QtDcmMoveDicomdir * mover = new QtDcmMoveDicomdir ( this );
392  mover->setDcmItem ( d->dfile.getDataset() );
393  mover->setOutputDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() );
394  mover->setImportDir ( d->outputDir );
395  mover->setSeries ( d->seriesToImport );
396  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( updateProgress ( int ) ), this, SLOT ( updateProgressBar ( int ) ) );
397  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( finished() ), this, SLOT ( moveSeriesFinished() ) );
398  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( serieMoved ( QString, QString, int ) ), this, SLOT ( onSerieMoved ( QString, QString, int ) ) );
399  mover->start();
400  }
401  else
402  {
403  QtDcmMoveScu * mover = new QtDcmMoveScu ( this );
404  mover->setOutputDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() );
405  mover->setSeries ( d->seriesToImport );
406  mover->setImportDir ( d->outputDir );
407  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( updateProgress ( int ) ), this, SLOT ( updateProgressBar ( int ) ) );
408  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( finished() ), this, SLOT ( moveSeriesFinished() ) );
409  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( serieMoved ( QString, QString, int ) ), this, SLOT ( onSerieMoved ( QString, QString, int ) ) );
410  mover->start();
411  }
412 }
413 
414 void QtDcmManager::getPreviewFromSelectedSerie ( QString uid, int elementIndex )
415 {
416  if ( !d->tempDir.exists() )
417  return;
418 
419  if ( !d->listImages.size() )
420  return;
421 
422  if ( d->listImages.size() < elementIndex )
423  return;
424 
425  QString imageId = d->listImages[elementIndex];
426 
427  if ( d->mapImages.size() && d->mapImages.contains ( elementIndex ) )
428  imageId = d->mapImages[elementIndex];
429 
430  if ( d->mode == "CD" )
431  {
432  QtDcmMoveDicomdir * mover = new QtDcmMoveDicomdir ( this );
433  mover->setMode ( QtDcmMoveDicomdir::PREVIEW );
434  mover->setDcmItem ( d->dfile.getDataset() );
435  mover->setOutputDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() );
436  mover->setSeries ( QStringList() << uid );
437  mover->setImageId ( imageId );
438  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( previewSlice ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( makePreview ( QString ) ) );
439  mover->start();
440  }
441  else // mode PACS
442  {
443  //Check if file has already been moved
444  this->clearPreview();
445  emit gettingPreview();
446 
447  QString modality ( "MR" );
448  if ( d->seriesTreeWidget->currentItem() )
449  modality = d->seriesTreeWidget->currentItem()->text ( 1 );
450  QString filename ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() + "/" + uid + "/" + modality + "." + imageId );
451 
452  if ( QFile ( filename ).exists() )
453  makePreview ( filename );
454  else
455  {
456  QtDcmMoveScu * mover = new QtDcmMoveScu ( this );
457  mover->setMode ( QtDcmMoveScu::PREVIEW );
458  mover->setOutputDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() );
459  mover->setSeries ( QStringList() << uid );
460  mover->setImageId ( imageId );
461  QObject::connect ( mover, SIGNAL ( previewSlice ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( makePreview ( QString ) ) );
462  QObject::connect ( this, SIGNAL ( gettingPreview ( ) ), mover, SLOT ( onStopMove() ) );
463 
464  mover->start();
465  }
466  }
467 
468  return;
469 }
470 
471 
472 void QtDcmManager::importSelectedSeries()
473 {
474  if ( this->useConverter() ) //Use QtDcm convertion tool (ITK or dcm2nii)
475  {
476  if ( this->seriesToImportSize() != 0 )
477  {
478  if ( this->getOutputdirMode() == QtDcmManager::DIALOG )
479  {
480  QFileDialog * dialog = new QFileDialog ( d->mainWidget );
481  dialog->setFileMode ( QFileDialog::Directory );
482  dialog->setOption ( QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly, true );
483  dialog->setDirectory ( QDir::home().dirName() );
484  dialog->setWindowTitle ( tr ( "Export directory" ) );
485  QString directory;
486 
487  if ( dialog->exec() )
488  {
489  directory = dialog->selectedFiles() [0];
490  }
491 
492  dialog->close();
493 
494  if ( !directory.isEmpty() ) // A file has been chosen
495  {
496  // Set the choosen output directory to the manager and launch the conversion process
497  this->setOutputDirectory ( directory );
498  this->moveSelectedSeries();
499  }
500 
501  delete dialog;
502  }
503  else
504  {
505  if ( QDir ( this->getOutputDirectory() ).exists() )
506  {
507  this->moveSelectedSeries();
508  }
509  }
510  }
511  }
512  else //Only copy the dicom files in a temporary directory
513  {
514  this->setOutputDirectory ( "" );
515  this->moveSelectedSeries();
516  }
517 }
518 
519 void QtDcmManager::importToDirectory ( QString directory )
520 {
521  if ( this->seriesToImportSize() != 0 )
522  {
523  this->setOutputDirectory ( directory );
524  this->moveSelectedSeries();
525  }
526 }
527 
528 void QtDcmManager::onSerieMoved ( QString directory , QString serie , int number )
529 {
530  emit serieMoved ( directory );
531  if ( d->useConverter )
532  {
533  QtDcmConvert * converter = new QtDcmConvert ( this );
534  converter->setInputDirectory ( directory );
535  converter->setOutputFilename ( serie + ".nii" );
536  converter->setOutputDirectory ( d->outputDir );
537  converter->setTempDirectory ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() );
538  converter->setSerieUID ( serie );
539  converter->convert();
540  delete converter;
541 
542  if ( number == this->seriesToImportSize() - 1 )
543  emit importFinished();
544  }
545 }
546 
547 void QtDcmManager::moveSeriesFinished()
548 {
549  if ( d->importWidget )
550  d->importWidget->importProgressBar->setValue ( 0 );
551 }
552 
553 void QtDcmManager::updateProgressBar ( int i )
554 {
555  if ( d->importWidget )
556  d->importWidget->importProgressBar->setValue ( i );
557  qApp->processEvents();
558 }
559 
560 void QtDcmManager::createTemporaryDirs()
561 {
562  //Creation d'un rpertoire temporaire pour la srie
563  QDir tempDir = QDir ( QDir::tempPath() );
564 
565  //Use Quuid to generate the temporary directory
566  QString randName = QUuid::createUuid().toString();
567 
568  if ( !tempDir.exists ( "qtdcm" ) )
569  tempDir.mkdir ( "qtdcm" );
570 
571  QDir qtdcmDir = QDir ( QDir::tempPath() + QDir::separator() + "qtdcm" );
572 
573  if ( !qtdcmDir.exists ( randName ) )
574  qtdcmDir.mkdir ( randName );
575 
576  d->tempDir = QDir ( qtdcmDir.absolutePath() + QDir::separator() + randName ); // tempDir = /tmp/qtdcm
577 
578  if ( !d->tempDir.exists ( "logs" ) )
579  {
580  if ( !d->tempDir.mkdir ( "logs" ) )
581  qDebug() << tr ( "Repertoire logs non cree" );
582  }
583 
584  d->logsDir = QDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() + QDir::separator() + "logs" );
585 }
586 
587 void QtDcmManager::deleteTemporaryDirs()
588 {
589  QStringList listLogs = d->logsDir.entryList ( QDir::Files, QDir::Name );
590 
591  for ( int i = 0; i < listLogs.size(); i++ )
592  {
593  d->logsDir.remove ( listLogs.at ( i ) );
594  }
595 
596  d->tempDir.rmdir ( "logs" );
597 
598  QStringList listSerie = d->tempDir.entryList ( QDir::Dirs, QDir::Name );
599 
600  for ( int i = 0; i < listSerie.size(); i++ )
601  {
602  if ( ! ( listSerie.at ( i ) == "." || listSerie.at ( i ) == ".." ) )
603  {
604  QDir serieDir ( d->tempDir.absolutePath() + QDir::separator() + listSerie.at ( i ) );
605  QStringList listFiles = serieDir.entryList ( QDir::Files, QDir::Name );
606 
607  for ( int j = 0; j < listFiles.size(); j++ )
608  {
609  serieDir.remove ( listFiles.at ( j ) );
610  }
611 
612  d->tempDir.rmdir ( listSerie.at ( i ) );
613  }
614  }
615 
616  QDir ( QDir::tempPath() ).rmdir ( d->tempDir.dirName() );
617 }
618 
619 void QtDcmManager::generateCurrentSerieDir()
620 {
621  if ( !d->serieId.isEmpty() )
622  {
623  d->currentSerieDir = d->tempDir.absolutePath() + QDir::separator() + d->serieId;
624  d->tempDir.mkdir ( d->serieId );
625  }
626 }
627 
628 void QtDcmManager::deleteCurrentSerieDir()
629 {
630  // Suppression des fichiers temporaires
631  QStringList listFiles = d->currentSerieDir.entryList ( QDir::Files, QDir::Name );
632 
633  for ( int i = 0; i < listFiles.size(); i++ )
634  {
635  d->currentSerieDir.remove ( listFiles.at ( i ) );
636  }
637 
638  // Suppression du rpertoire temporaire
639  if ( !d->tempDir.rmdir ( d->serieId ) )
640  qDebug() << tr ( "Probleme lors de la suppression du rpertoire temporaire" );
641 }
642 
643 void QtDcmManager::makePreview ( QString filename )
644 {
645  DcmRLEDecoderRegistration::registerCodecs ( OFFalse, OFFalse );
646  DJDecoderRegistration::registerCodecs ( EDC_photometricInterpretation, EUC_default, EPC_default, OFFalse );
647  DcmFileFormat file;
648  file.loadFile ( filename.toLatin1().data() );
649  DcmDataset * dset = file.getDataset();
650  DicomImage* dcimage = new DicomImage ( dset, file.getDataset()->getOriginalXfer(), CIF_MayDetachPixelData );
651 
652 
653  if ( dcimage != NULL )
654  {
655  dcimage->setNoDisplayFunction();
656  dcimage->hideAllOverlays();
657  dcimage->setNoVoiTransformation();
658 
659  if ( dcimage->getStatus() == EIS_Normal )
660  {
661  Uint32 *pixelData = ( Uint32 * ) ( dcimage->getOutputData ( 32 /* bits per sample */ ) );
662 
663  if ( pixelData != NULL )
664  {
665  Uint8 *colored = new Uint8[dcimage->getWidth() * dcimage->getHeight() * 4]; //4 * dcimage->getWidth() * dcimage->getHeight() matrix
666  Uint8 *col = colored;
667  Uint32 *p = pixelData;
668  //get the highest values for RGBA, then use them to scale the pixel luminosity
669  Uint32 p_max = 0;
670  Uint32 p_min = std::numeric_limits<Uint32>::max();
671 
672  for ( unsigned i = 0; i < dcimage->getWidth(); ++i )
673  for ( unsigned j = 0; j < dcimage->getHeight(); ++j, ++p )
674  {
675  if ( *p > p_max )
676  p_max = *p;
677 
678  if ( *p < p_min )
679  p_min = *p;
680  }
681 
682  double a = 4294967295.f / ( ( double ) p_max - ( double ) p_min );
683 
684  //re-initialize 'col'
685  p = pixelData;
686  //copy the pixels in our QImage
687 
688  for ( unsigned i = 0; i < dcimage->getWidth(); ++i )
689  for ( unsigned j = 0; j < dcimage->getHeight(); ++j, ++p )
690  {
691  *col = ( Uint8 ) ( ( 255.f / 4294967295.f ) * ( a * ( ( double ) ( *p ) - ( double ) p_min ) ) );
692  ++col;
693  *col = ( Uint8 ) ( ( 255.f / 4294967295.f ) * ( a * ( ( double ) ( *p ) - ( double ) p_min ) ) );
694  ++col;
695  *col = ( Uint8 ) ( ( 255.f / 4294967295.f ) * ( a * ( ( double ) ( *p ) - ( double ) p_min ) ) );
696  ++col;
697  *col = 255;
698  ++col;
699  }
700 
701  QImage image ( colored, dcimage->getWidth(), dcimage->getHeight(), QImage::Format_ARGB32 );
702 
703  if ( d->previewWidget )
704  d->previewWidget->imageLabel->setPixmap ( QPixmap::fromImage ( image.scaled ( 130,130 ), Qt::AutoColor ) );
705 
706  delete[] colored;
707 
708  }
709  }
710 
711  delete dcimage;
712  }
713 }
714 
715 // Getters and setters
716 QString QtDcmManager::getDicomdir() const
717 {
718  return d->dicomdir;
719 }
720 
721 void QtDcmManager::setDicomdir ( QString dicomdir )
722 {
723  d->dicomdir = dicomdir;
724  //Load dicomdir in a DCMTK DicomFileFormat object
725  OFCondition status;
726 
727  if ( ! ( status = d->dfile.loadFile ( d->dicomdir.toUtf8().data() ) ).good() )
728  {
729  return;
730  }
731 }

748 void QtDcmManager::setCurrentPacs ( int index )
749 {

751  d->currentPacs = QtDcmPreferences::instance()->getServers().at ( index );
752 }

774 QString QtDcmManager::getPatientBirthDate()
775 {
776  QString birthdate;
777  if ( d->patientsTreeWidget )
778  if ( d->patientsTreeWidget->currentItem() )
779  birthdate = d->patientsTreeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 2,0 ).toString();
780  qDebug() << birthdate;
781  return birthdate;
782 }
783 
784 QString QtDcmManager::getPatientSex()
785 {
786  QString sex ( "" );
787  if ( d->patientsTreeWidget )
788  if ( d->patientsTreeWidget->currentItem() )
789  sex = d->patientsTreeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 3,0 ).toString();
790  qDebug() << sex;
791  return sex;
792 }
793 
794 QString QtDcmManager::getExamDate()
795 {
796  QString examDate;
797  if ( d->studiesTreeWidget )
798  if ( d->studiesTreeWidget->currentItem() )
799  examDate = d->studiesTreeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 1,0 ).toString();
800  qDebug() << examDate;
801  return examDate;
802 }

895 void QtDcmManager::addSerieToImport ( QString uid )
896 {

898  d->seriesToImport.append ( uid );
899 }

901 void QtDcmManager::removeSerieToImport ( QString uid )
902 {
903  if ( d->seriesToImport.contains ( uid ) )
904  d->seriesToImport.removeOne ( uid );
905 }
